text: Lawrence Brooks (September 12, 1909 â€“ January 5, 2022) was an American veteran of the United States Army. He was the oldest living man in the United States. A supercentenarian, he was the oldest known American World War II veteran. He was born in Norwood, Louisiana. Brooks died on January 5, 2022, in his New Orleans home, at the age of 112. == References == Category:1909 births Category:2022 deaths Category:African-American military personnel Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:African-American supercentenarians Category:People from New Orleans Category:Military people from Louisiana
title: Lawrence Brooks (American veteran)
